articles.description: Das große Elektro-SUV von BMW polarisiert - und weckt auch bei unserem Tester einige Vorurteile. Nicht alle kann er im Test entkräften.

articles.title: 做空機構 Hindenburg 轉多力挺，Twitter 股價飆近 8%

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Hyundai Aims to Take on Tesla With Launch of Ioniq 6 First Electric Sedan
articles.description: Hyundai Motor on Thursday announced the launch of Ioniq 6, its first electric sedan. The South Korean manufacturer aims to grab a bigger share of the electric vehicle market from leader Tesla. It plans to launch 31 electric models through 2030, expanding its …
articles.content: Hyundai Motor Co on Thursday launched its first electric sedan, Ioniq 6, which the South Korean automaker is betting will help it grab a bigger share of the electric vehicle (EV) market dominated by … [+2254 chars]
